topicsInfo.admissions: Admissions at SNJB COE are through DTE Maharashtra CAP. 1st year requires 12th Science PCM + MHT-CET/JEE. Direct 2nd year needs Diploma with 45% (General) or 40% (Reserved).
topicsInfo.programs: UG: Civil, Computer, Mechanical, E&TC, AI & DS. PG: MBA, M.Tech (Computer Engg). First year is common.
topicsInfo.departments: Departments include Civil, Computer, Mechanical, E&TC, AI & DS, and MBA, each led by experienced faculty.
topicsInfo.placements: Top recruiters: TCS, Infosys, Wipro. Highest package: ‚Çπ10 LPA. Average: ‚Çπ3.2 LPA. Includes training, internships, and mock interviews.
topicsInfo.facilities: Smart classrooms, labs, library, auditorium, hostel, WiFi, canteen, ATM, gym, medical, transport, and sports complex.
topicsInfo.hostel: Separate hostels for boys & girls with mess, Wi-Fi, 24/7 security, medical facilities, gym, and clean rooms.
topicsInfo.vision: To transform learners through quality technical education for creativity, professionalism, and societal growth.
topicsInfo.clubs: Join Coding Club, Robotics Club, Entrepreneurship Cell, NSS, Cultural Club, and Sustainability Cell.
